title: Is This Mine Haunted? | Ghost Stories
description:
Today on a chilling episode of Real Ghost Stories Online.

When an emergency services officer for a well-known mining company works a late shift, not only is the atmosphere charged with anxious energy due to an equipment fire. 
 
But could it also be charged with the energy of a spirit from the past? 

A spirit who may have once worked the mine in life, now standing by on the other side to warn the living of potential dangers?  

That story, and much more, today, on Real Ghost Stories Online.

If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!

To get access to:

  • The Worlds LARGEST AUDIO ARCHIVE of GHOST STORIES!
  • New EPP Bonus Episodes Every Week and ALL of our past EPP Bonus Episodes
